DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate effect rectal distension , control electronic barostat , cognitive control ability healthy subject . We use Stroop task intertemporal choice task standard instrument . Like bladder control rectal control , Stroop task performance intertemporal choice - though different task surface - dependent conflict monitoring function anterior cingulate cortex . The Stroop task require name print color series visually present color word , reaction time error rate typically used performance indicator . When word color word meaning match , performance task ( color name ) require inhibition ( near ) automatic response ( word reading ) . The intertemporal choice task consist series choice sooner small monetary reward large later reward . The choice construct allow estimation discount parameter , index level impulsiveness manifest participant time choice make . The hypothesis inhibition induce urge generate rectal distension improve cognitive inhibitory performance , previously show bladder filling .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Inhibitory Control Processes Induced Rectal Distension Impulse Control Measured Stroop Task Performance Intertemporal Discounting .
DOC.criteria: healthy male nonpregnant , nonbreastfeeding female participant , age 1860 year old time consent . use medication within 48 h dose initiation ; structural metabolic disease affect gastrointestinal system functional gastrointestinal disorder ; previous abdominal surgery appendectomy , cholecystectomy , hysterectomy , hernia repair ; know illness diabetes , cardiovascular lung disease ; current psychiatric disorder ( anxiety , depression , substance use ) ; use agent influence bowel habit , i.e . anticholinergic ( include antihistamine anticholinergic property ) , spasmolytic prokinetics 7 day study .
